derivation: from a compound of G1 (ἀτενίζω) (as a particle of union) and (to stretch);
kjv_def: behold earnestly (stedfastly), fasten (eyes), look (earnestly, stedfastly, up stedfastly), set eyes
outline:
1. to fix the eyes on, gaze upon
  2. to look into anything
  3. metaph. to fix one's mind on one as an example
